title: Daily Reminder that Garen > Mordekaiser > Veigar > Riven

replies.body:
You must be mistaken.
Everybody knows Mordekaiser es numero uno!

HUE HUE HUE HUE HUE HUE HUE HUE HUE HUE

Sure, Morde is a badass:
http://i.imgur.com/CyVcgUa.gif?Noredirect

But he does not spin, therefore he cannot win. That is basic science bro.
http://49.media.tumblr.com/1b664466acdef475bed5c3c639674cd5/tumblr_mn363iYK1z1so6il8o1_250.gif
{{champion:161}} Did someone say science?
http://i.imgur.com/AqnRut5.gif?Noredirect
{{champion:74}} Somebody wants science?
{{champion:74}} {{champion:112}} Science?

> [{quoted}](name=Skelenth,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=O17KdH1H,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-04-20T15:24:35.970+0000)
>
> {{champion:161}} Did someone say science?

http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/517/111/fbd.jpg
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/6m4sQQBmW_0/hqdefault.jpg

Please wicked backflips are the way to to go

https://49.media.tumblr.com/49d7ac9a7e445d8f61d8de37467e12aa/tumblr_nteskqYSfs1u7sjavo1_400.gif

She can also sing!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U-6NykqtUSw

(Wish it wasn't auto-tuned Cristina Vee already has a pretty singing voice ;w;)

Riven is a homeless exiled disgrace. She cannot compete with the pure and just light of Demacia.
http://41.media.tumblr.com/af257df02ad10c7b2c2839a2c265d87c/tumblr_nc67oxIG9k1rpyxc9o1_1280.png
Now that's just mean, at least she isn't a bland character like Garen

Be very careful son. That sounds awfully close to something a villain would say. Garen is heroic badass, and the epitome of Justice. 
https://mondocon-site.s3.amazonaws.com/guests/150/leagueoflegendsgarendaverapoza__large.jpg

Riven is a war criminal whose own people tried to kill her. A sword really does mirror its owner. 
http://41.media.tumblr.com/66d5bf8560341ea444688d2e7fb734c2/tumblr_mwt0myAmvs1so0750o1_1280.jpg

Ah, Ah your forgetting well known singer

http://i.imgur.com/XgtBCO4.jpg

Yeah, well Garen finally killed the Dunk Hunt dog. JUSTICE!
http://i14.photobucket.com/albums/a347/Saiyuki4Life/FuckGaren.png
Alot of people have
Not Riven. She would only kill him if he was totally defenseless.

Mama Riven says otherwise
http://41.media.tumblr.com/584c4ab47104a63234e39936edb8450c/tumblr_n83uupgwny1tof9kfo4_500.png
Annie isn't defenseless, so Riven will protect her and claim it is out of honor. But if Annie had no powers, she would do to her what she did to countless children in Ionia.
I don't know Annie looks pretty beat up and is crying

But isn't *completely* defenseless. Tibbers is still there somewhere. Riven is only willing to slaughter innocent people if there is no risk to her own life. The moment *her* life was endanger by the brutality of the Noxus she immediately ran.
you're treading on thin ice my friend
Now, now. Children, Elders, Demacians, Noxians, all shall crumble once the Dead walk the land.
So I should still be safe. Riven wouldn't try to kill me until *after* I had fallen though the ice and developed hypothermia. She will just kill some orphans and puppies while she waits.

https://49.media.tumblr.com/05502d7128e5549cf52075df6c51eb5d/tumblr_nw4i7kBtFw1uz2pefo1_250.gif
Voli FTW

Sure, Voli is good. But he BEARly falls short.
http://eukito.com.br/wp-content/uploads/2012/10/tumblr_mc4bg8NLBM1ri4cgdo1_400.gif
https://media.giphy.com/media/3o6ozrlBm4vVrVqvqo/giphy.gif

http://24.media.tumblr.com/bb869c4f5af4faf7302e0c3851cccfef/tumblr_n17al29BpG1smcbm7o1_250.gif
Although I can't help feeling a **little** worried that this is a trap, and you will turn on my **short**ly.

I don't see anybody else saying it sooooo:
IS THAT A SHORT JOKE? {{champion:45}}
Just a **small** one.

SENPAI FISH NOTICED ME!
stay calm....
ahem

{{champion:45}} I AM EVIL! STOP LAUGHING

Come now, you had to know it would only be a **short** wait before I noticed you.
https://media.giphy.com/media/3o85xA1EY5AppJ2GqI/giphy.gif

Lies, all lies!
http://s1.narvii.com/image/x2xza7gtexrxxrggffuqsrsm7xjktjya_hq.jpg

But you are forgetting one small thing...
+6
http://i.imgur.com/vbe2SqZ.gif

http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/56de599ee03525a511f44c4aafeb5b6d.gif

so we just gon ignore yorick and his skills on the shovel?

http://pa1.narvii.com/5759/7d4b9a24b6bcba52992f7727cfa9b29e7a1f0619_hq.gif

She also spins to win, and can eat you. Clearly Rek'Sai > Garen
She would get Rek't if she tried to stand before the might of Demacia. If regular daylight can hurt voidlings, than the pure light of Demacia will absolutely devastate them.

Given all the unstoppable hunting she does in the middle of the desert, I'm inclined to believe sunlight doesn't effect her, or she's too badass to care. Besides, she's big enough to eat your "justice" whole.

Here is your problem though: Anyone who would try and kill Garen is a villain. And we all know what happens to villains:
http://i.imgur.com/W0wVY4c.gif?Noredirect

{{champion:201}} If they want a fight, we will oblige.

https://31.media.tumblr.com/027766161c295dc2a346b73223d17bbe/tumblr_inline_o2sjtqXAha1tii0jj_500.gif

Garen? More like 1 shot
 https://i.ytimg.com/vi/zqAQBBdRpt8/maxresdefault.jpg
http://49.media.tumblr.com/f465bc8dab1fc71d6025eca52c128563/tumblr_nsmu97BvJQ1tqu5dto1_400.gif
http://orig07.deviantart.net/c904/f/2015/186/d/1/animation___garen_by_serklaz-d9022mn.gif http://orig11.deviantart.net/134a/f/2015/179/b/e/becbaaff375cf7d0c0e4adf616b796d7-d8z3tnb.gif Try to catch me

Lol, nobody can catch Bard. Nobody.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hsL9lzl4n_c

Teemo > Garen

Not even the power of justice can bring down Satan.

http://cdn.gifbay.com/2013/06/teemo-56263.gif

Please, Teemo cannot even beat Nami. How could he ever beat the pure light of Demacia?
https://embed.gyazo.com/7f1ef8b49fa82e873af707088320fcbb.gif

> Garen > the entire League roster

ftfy
http://i1225.photobucket.com/albums/ee399/CherrySueDointheDo/98728-that-goes-without-saying-gif-g-he7c_zps04e47f30.gif
https://m.popkey.co/beeea8/6ml4O.gif

Or more simply put:

Garen > Filthy accursed Noxus villains
